subject: Re: New files posted from Frank's box and RS box files posted to files section
author: mllejade
full_text:
Hi Bruce,

Thanking for sharing your files.  I listened to most of them and 
thought that "Yes I'll be your guest" from Frank's box came through 
very clearly.

I'm just speaking for myself, but if one can upload some files without 
giving away what one thinks it's saying (that is, don't type it out in 
the title), then it might be more validating if people hear the same 
response independent of any suggestion on the part of the author.  I'm 
sure this has been discussed before, but I'd like to bring it up again 
for comments.

Thanks,
Sharon


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333" 
<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> Hey Guy's 
> 
> posted some new files to the files section from Frank's box and the 
RS 
> 470. If you guy's have a chance please give a listen.
> 
> the files are posted in the folders marked bruce in the files section.
> 
> Bruce
>
